awd_titl_txt: Peptide Biosynthetic Enzyme Expression in Hypertension and  Hyperactivity
awd_abstract_narration: This is a Research Planning Grant to enable Dr. Braas to                      initiate independent studies of peptide biosynthetic enzyme                     expression in hypertension and hyperactivity, using inbred                      strains of rats which express spontaneous hypertension as a model               system.                                                                                                                                                         It is anticipated that this award will help Dr. Braas obtain the                preliminary results necessary to launch an independent research                 career.

inst.inst_name: University of Vermont & State Agricultural College
